title: Action Learning-Based Influencing Skills Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic communication skills and understanding of work environments
context.additional_context: Reflective learning through project execution reflecting real work scenarios and peer feedback

learning_goals: Learners can apply influence techniques by utilizing at least three effective persuasion strategies in real-world work scenarios.
Learners can analyze conflict situations arising during team collaboration and propose resolution strategies.
Learners can develop personal competency development plans based on the results of action learning projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
